title: Il cinema a Bologna: Renzo Renzi e la Columbus film
current_location: Renzo Renzi Library, Cineteca di Bologna
description: Video interview in which Renzo Renzi recalls his experience with the Columbus Film production company and the history of cinema in Bologna.
notes: Opening on-screen text: 'Cineteca del Comune di Bologna presenta' followed by the title 'Il cinema a Bologna: Renzo Renzi e la Columbus film'.
